Phrase: Verforet, the Country of Deep Green and Magic. In this country where elves and humans have coexisted since time immemorial, the two races brought their wisdom and technology together and developed a diverse culture.
The best example of this are the ancient ruins scattered throughout Verforet.

This time, we, the Special Steel Squad, visited a forest area in the eastern parts of Verforet. We received a very interesting report from two Train Knights, experts in the ruins of this forest, that "we have discovered some ruins of steel", so we came here to investigate.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Gather around, everyone. I'm going to start briefing you all on the mission.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Our mission this time is to investigate a newly discovered archaeological site. Fortunately, the first discoverers are Train Knights from the SSS. In coordination with the Gendarmerie, we were able to quickly secure the site. We have a garrison posted in this forest area, so we should be able to focus on the investigation.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Vivienne seems more eager than usual today.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Miss Vivienne is leading the core of this operation, you know. The Verforet Gendarmerie seems to be paying a lot of attention to her, so I think she's facing a lot of pressure.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: The discovery of the site is quite important for the Verforet Gendarmerie. I hear that the upper echelons are in an uproar. As soon as we of the SSS have finished our investigations, the Gendarmerie's survey team and archaeologists will also examine the site.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Well, there's absolutely no chance that the Ruins of Steel is normal. I think they will be the ones doing the serious investigation of the ruins. Our role is less about investigatations, more so to just ensure safety inside the ruins...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Before I start explaining the precautions, I will read out the report by the first discoverer. All members of this survey team should know the situation at the time of discovery.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Let's see...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Alas, reacting to my sacred powers, what that has emerged from beneath the grounds of Verforet is undoubtedly the... S-Sacred Holy Power? The Sacred Holy Power has thus enveloped the Ruins of Steel...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: The moment I opened this door of rock forged with greyness, eternal darkness awaited to embrace me. The path of death leading to the abyss shall be paved upon the presence of arcane arts.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: But I am the one without such arcane arts. It is nigh impossible for me to set foot towards the path of death. The Holy Angel Saint-Sever also advised within me: 'Do not go'.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Uh, what the heck is this report, it's like an adventure novel. What exactly is a door of rock forged with greyness?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Ver-Verforench dialect? I didn't quite understand what it meant...

Name: Putra
Phrase: Vivienne, can you translate all that for me?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: You see that little fort made of stone over there? The report's saying that's the entrance to the ruins.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: When she went inside, she found the Ruins of Steel, but she didn't want to go too deep because it looked dangerous. I think that's what she meant. By the way, this is no Verforench dialect. It's just common language.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: A door of rock forged with greyness... This sentence is so wordy.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: To Yoshino, it looks like a tochka. What do you think, Yakky-tan?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: I think it looks like a tochka too. And don't casually call me 'Yakky-tan'.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Oooooh- Thought it was sneaked in well, but you caught it.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: That's no ruins or anything. It's a pillbox of a military fortress. Isn't this some kind of a weird underground fortress that the Verforet Gendarmerie was building in secret?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: If these were found near the border with Eisengrad, I too would have the same doubts. They say there were a lot of unofficial units on the Northern Front...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: But this is a safe zone where civilians are allowed to enter, you know? You can't build a military fortress in a place where children who have just learnt to shoot a bow are doing their hunting practice. It's not the kind of place where you can build a fortress without anyone noticing.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: ...And if it's just a military fortress, it wouldn't suddenly appear out of the ground and spit Mist, would it?
Yes. The Ruins of Steel discovered this time suddenly appear in a previously cleared area, and Phantom Mist is generated from the entrance to the ruins.
It is not unusual for Phantom Mist to appear on ruins and abandoned buildings, but it is not often that such a huge structure like ruins would pop out of nothing.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: My senses that it appeared with the Mist... is strong.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: There must be a source of Phantom Mist in the ruins. It is similar in nature to the Koutetsu Ningyou we've encountered in Nishiki.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: The worst thing would be if the entire ruins was the source of the Phantom Mist. Well, we only saw the entrance, but according to that weird report, the ruins extend underground, don't they?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Oui, we don't know what's going on inside the ruins, and if we go underground, our escape routes are limited. That's why we need helpers who are used to exploring the ruins.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: That's why I'm asking the two archaeological enthusiasts who were the first to discover the ruins to accompany us on this mission. They are a bit peculiar, but they are the best at getting into and out of ruins.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: But I don't see them. The rendezvous point should be around here...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: They're both supposed to be on their way here from their Gendarmerie stations, so maybe they've encountered some Phantom Mist and are running late.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: I can't believe that such thick Phantom Mist can occur in this forest. It used to be a nice playground for children...

Name: Putra
Phrase: What an out-of-character thing to say from you! Let's clean it up and put it back where it belongs, where it's safe! That's why we're here, isn't it?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Putra...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: You're right. I shouldn't be the one making everyone feel insecure!

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hawawa, I asked Vivienne to let me explain too, but she said everything already...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Anyway, this time we're on a mission to investigate the mysterious ruins found in Verforet!
